about_the_game:
Young Detectives: School
Dive into a world of colorful discovery with "Young Detectives: School," the ultimate spot the difference game for young minds!

Your mission: to identify the subtle distinctions between seemingly identical scenes.
Explore 30 vibrant and intricately designed 2D levels, each brimming with challenging differences to find.
Set in a playful school themed environment, players step into the shoes of a keen eyed detective.
Can't spot the difference? No problem! Our handy hint button is always ready to assist, guiding you to the next elusive change.

Key Features:

  • 30 Diverse Levels: From classrooms to playgrounds, each level offers a unique challenge.
  • Stuck? Use Hints: Use hints to reveal the next difference and keep the fun going.
  • Multilingual Support: Play in your preferred language, with support for 27 different languages.
  • Steam Achievements: Unlock a range of achievements as you master each level and sharpen your detective skills.

Perfect for players of all ages, "Young Detectives: School" combines engaging gameplay with educational fun. Are you ready to become the ultimate school detective?
